select ri.id, ri.tag_id, ri.user_id, ri.content, ri.post_id, ri.reply_user_id, ri.send_create, ri.delete_flag, si.name as studentName, si.images as studentImages, poi.title from reply_info ri left join student_info si on (si.id = ri.user_id) left join post_info poi on (poi.id = ri.post_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.studentName},'%')
AND poi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
order by send_create desc

SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.post_id AS postId, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.send_create AS sendCreate, pi.title, tu.name as username, tu.images, tu1.name as replyUserName FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN post_info pi ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) LEFT JOIN student_info tu ON ( tu.id = ri.user_id ) LEFT JOIN student_info tu1 ON ( tu1.id = ri.reply_user_id ) WHERE ri.delete_flag = 0 AND ri.post_id = #{ postId } ORDER BY ri.send_create ASC
